message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it. I'm willing to let it go for $14000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Could you consider that?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, but I'm not willing to go that low. I can meet you in the middle at $13000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12500?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet on price. I can see that you're serious about the product, so I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $13200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $12000?
